title: CL A Dedicated Tanker & Hazmat - 1925/WK Salary Out 21 Home 6-8 Days
description:
We're actively seeking dedicated Class A drivers to join our team, running dedicated regional routes with a fantastic starting pay of $300/Day for all drivers. Your earnings will increase up to $324/Day, with a $3/Day pay raise every 6 months. Drivers must hold Hazmat and Tanker endorsements, along with a minimum of 1-year verifiable Class A driving experience (preferably Tanker OTR, but no OTR experience or Tanker? No worries – we provide training).


**Key Highlights:**



* Dedicated regional runs to one client, based on customer needs, covering various regional areas in the continental US. Regions include FL, NV to NM, TX, St Louis, and more.
* Company pays for your flight home during home time if you are not within 200 miles to drive. If you choose to drive, ensure you have a secure parking location or park at your house.
* Trucks are not slip-seated; they are 100% assigned to drivers, and they are newer model Peterbilts.
* Flexible run/home time options: 21 days out with 5-7 days home or over 21 days out with a minimum of 7 days home.
* Running a cryogenic tanker with no cryogenic experience needed. Some tanker experience is required, and hazmat endorsement is a must.


Compensation and Benefits:



* $1500 sign-on bonus ($500 after orientation and $1000 after 30 days)
* First-year pay ranges from $86,000 to $106,000.
* Full training provided on cryogenic deliveries at $125/Day.
* Full benefits kick in after 60 days, including medical, vision, dental, PTO, 401K, and cell phone reimbursement.


Requirements:



* One-year verifiable Class A OTR or Regional driving experience in the last 3 years with at least some tanker experience.
* Must have Hazmat and Tanker endorsements; those with tanker or cryogenic experience will be expedited.
* Cannot be SAP – no failed or refused drug test ever.
* Relatively clean MVR
* No more than 5 jobs in the last 3 years, avoiding job hopping.


Join us for a fulfilling career offering exceptional daily pay and the best home time in the industry

title: Dental Assistant
description:
At TetraHealth Dentistry, we are reshaping the patient experience and quality of care for our patients through a biological and integrative approach. We believe in delivering patients personalized, cutting-edge, and minimally invasive treatments across restorative, prosthetic, periodontal, and orthodontic therapies in a brand new state-of-the-art and office.

We are looking for a candidate that would be able to take on responsibility to organize the office and create a personable and patient-oriented experience to our patients.

Core Responsibilities:

- Act as a liaison between the dentist, the patient and the administrative staff, ensuring that all aspects of the dental treatment are handled efficiently and effectively.

- Assist the dentist during procedures and maintain a sterile working environment.

- Taking digital scanning and digital radiographs.

- Manage treatment records/notes, ensuring that all necessary documentation is accurate and up-to-date.

- Collaborate with the administrative team to optimize office schedules and enhance patient satisfaction.

- Follow Up with patients to ensure they are informed about their upcoming appointments and preparatory steps they need to take. Along with addressing patient questions and concerns regarding scheduled and pending treatments.

- Take care of material inventory and manage laboratory cases.

Qualifications:

\\*Strong work ethic, interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with patients

\\*Excellent communication (verbal & written), critical thinking and problem solving skills

\\*Ability to multitask, prioritize task and work efficiently in a fast paced environment

\\*Exceptional attention to detail to ensure accuracy in patient records and financials

\\*Proficient in computer skills, technology, and cloud based applications

\\*If you have experience with CurveHero software, taking CBCT x-rays, digital scanning, or worked in a biological dental office please share this experience.

Please submit your resume and highlight any important qualification you feel would make you a good fit for the role.

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Pay: $25.00 - $35.00 per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Benefits:

* 401(k)
* 401(k) matching
* Dental insurance
* Employee discount
* Free parking
* Health insurance
* Paid sick time
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Monday to Friday

Experience:

* Dental assisting: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: In person

title: Laundry Delivery Driver

Must be able to carry 50lbs of laundry up and down stairs
